name: Side implements Iterable(Cublet)
description: A Side represents one side of the cube - the 9 pieces of a single face. It supports an operation for turning and iterating over all Cublets in clockwise order

instanceVariables.name: cublets
instanceVariables.description: The array of Cublets that make up the side, in clockwise order starting from the top-left Cublet of the side.

instanceVariables.name: plane
instanceVariables.description: The XCoordinate, YCoordinate, or ZCoordinate representing the plane in which this side lives

arguments.name: plane
arguments.description: The XCoordinate, YCoordinate, or ZCoordinate representing the plane in which this side lives

arguments.name: cube
arguments.description: The Cube from which to extract the side

methods.name: getPlane()
methods.description: Returns Coordinate representing the plane in which this Side lives

methods.name: iterator()
methods.description: Returns an Iterator over all the Cublets of this Side in clockwise order, starting from the top-left

methods.name: permuteClockwise()
methods.description: Returns a new Side that permutes all the Cublets of this side one turn clockwise

methods.name: orientClockwise()
methods.description: Returns a new Side that orients the Corners and Edges appropriately when making a clockwise turn of this Side

methods.name: turnClockwise()
methods.description: Returns a new Side representing this Side turned once clockwise

methods.name: toString()
methods.description: Returns a String representation of this Side
